official_title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to repeal the small business subcontracting program under section 8(a) of such Act, and to direct the Small Business Administration to recommend to the Congress a more effective method of furthering the purposes of such section.
short_title: Small Business Development Program Improvement Act of 1981

summary.text: Small Business Development Program Improvement Act of 1981 - Amends the Small Business Act to repeal the subcontracting program for socially and economically disadvantaged small businesses. Directs the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to submit to the House and Senate Committees on Small Business legislative recommendations for small business development programs with special attention to small businesses located in high unemployment or low income areas or owned by low-income individuals.

titles.title: Small Business Development Program Improvement Act of 1981

A bill to amend the Small Business Act to repeal the small business subcontracting program under section 8(a) of such Act, and to direct the Small Business Administration to recommend to the Congress a more effective method of furthering the purposes of such section.
